ValidationRule.description: Checks if the Funds Retained Closing Balance field is blank when a Finance Summary with Record Type Endowment Fund Summary is created or updated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Funds_Retained_Closing_Balance__c ) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Endowment_Fund_Summary', OR( ISNULL( Funds_Retained_Closing_Balance__c ), ISBLANK( Funds_Retained_Closing_Balance__c ) ) )
